name: CycleBreaker (itch)
description:
CycleBreaker is a short story/platformer made for the Weekly Game Jam 148. It's the first game I've done for a jam, but the second game I've put on the site. There are two endings, so feel free to play it more than once.

I'm sorry there's no browser version of this game, It's extremely un-optimized and full of bugs.
